p: Activation of ERK1/2 phosphorylation by 1,3-dithiane was one of the primary responses observed in our kinase array ( Figure 3). Thus, we further characterized the time-dependent modulation of this response and found that activation of ERK1/2 phosphorylation was maximal after a 15-min treatment with 1,3-dithiane ( Figure 3, Inset).
